system.description:
Granted Power: For a total time per day of 1 round per cleric level you possess, you can act normally regardless of magical effects that impede movement, as if you were affected by the freedom of movement spell. This effect occurs automatically as soon as it applies, lasts until it runs out or is no longer needed, and can operate multiple times per day (up to the total daily limit of rounds).

Add Survival to your list of cleric class skills.
